title: Cosmic Frontier - LOFI Music Collection
description: Set the mood for space exploration, discovery, and wonder with these chill, beat-driven melodies. Perfect for spacefaring adventures, futuristic cityscapes, or inspiring intros.
longDescription:
Embark on an interstellar voyage with Cosmic Frontier: LOFI Music Collection, a curated selection of 10 captivating LOFI tracks designed to fuel your creativity and enhance the atmosphere of your games and content.


Unleash Your Inner Explorer


Set the mood for space exploration, discovery, and wonder with these chill, beat-driven melodies. Perfect for spacefaring adventures, futuristic cityscapes, or inspiring intros.


Royalty-Free for Streamers and Developers


Cosmic Frontier is completely royalty-free, granting you the freedom to use these tracks across your streams, games, and YouTube videos without any attribution required.


Price: $19.99


Launch into the Cosmos Today!


Immerse your audience in the vast expanse of space and elevate your content's production value with Cosmic Frontier: LOFI Music Collection. Purchase now and blast off!


--


Music Preview 1: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=y_OnX4YKnpA

Music Preview 2: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8zJSqx7pClE

Music Preview 3: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iDCOcgKLcfo


--


We also have a number of other music collections and bundles available for sale at our publisher page, click here to check out our catalogue.
technicalDetails:
Sample rate / bit rate: (44,100 Hz)

Do Sound FX loop: (No)

Windows: (Yes)
